name: Toormix red notebook from Spain
description:
Toormix, the creative studio that has developed the SPAIN arts & culture branding, has designed a colorful and convenient notebooks to be easy to carry eveywhere. Use them to write, to draw, to sketch or just to doodle at boring meetings. The illustrations of geometric hands in these notebooks mirror the visual identity of the SPAIN arts & culture brand. These journals will be good companions for your travels and thoughts. Size: 120 pages / 140 x 180 mm (5,5’ x 7,8’).

About Toormix

Toormix is a creative studio born in Barcelona in 2000 and directed by Oriol Armengou and Ferran Mitjans. They specialize in design and brand identity and they face their projects with a clear strategic and conceptual vision, always looking for innovative visual approaches. They also work within their atelier, a parallel space oriented towards research, thinking and their own projects. They have worked with clients such as Desigual, Camper, Spain USA Foundation, H10 Hotels, Spanish Ministry of Culture, Barcelona City Council, L'Auditori and chef José Andrés among others.

name: Loreak Mendian red T-shirt for SPAIN arts & culture
description:
SPAIN arts & culture commissioned Loreak Mendian to create a t-shirt that would transmit the warmth, friendship, and good feeling of Spanish society. After a few designs and exchanges, the design was selected: A classic wicker chair sustained by four legs, inviting people to meet up on the streets; to laugh, to sing, to live. The text that accompanies the illustration makes the message clear by saying “Come and sit with us.” We are happy with the results and hope that you enjoy it as much as we liked designing it.

About Loreak Mendian

As a brand, Loreak Mendian remains faithful to itself — they have been able to grow, develop and explore their universe, which is built on the four pillars of our creative map: Basque roots, arts, music and surf. The timeless nature of the classics is a big reference for Loreak Mendian’s collections for boys and girls, which reveal a taste for vintage aesthetics, pure shapes, functional clothes and well-done items. Loreak Mendian is a ceaselessly inquiring brand, capable of appreciating and valuing human inventiveness. As a brave brand, instead of feeling threatened by others’ creativity, they are always looking for synergies with other artists, regardless of the disciplines involved. The result of their collaborations will always be enriching.

name: peSeta messenger bag for SPAIN arts & culture
description:
peSeta proudly presents a limited series of 100 bags made especially for Spain arts & culture. Being a special request, we decided to use strong cordura material to protect the exterior and for the lining we used a well-made cloth from a traditional fabric store. The bag has a durable, modern and simple shoulder strap for comfortable and easy transport. As always, even though we use fabrics from all over the world, peSeta designs and produces all our handcrafted products locally in Madrid, Spain.

About peSeta

peSeta has been making beautiful things since the beginning of the century. Laura Martínez del Pozo, entrepreneur and fabric lover, started the brand as a natural projection of her love for all things cut and sewn. In 2005, Jaime Sevilla Moreno joined her without thinking twice. Both were born in 1978. In peSeta, they mix their business and artistic interests into something durable and self-fulfilling. peSeta is a local brand with worldwide aspirations. Each product is dreamt, designed and produced in the region of Madrid, Spain, for people from all over the planet.
